attributes.action: Punish ALL Serious Offences with imprisonment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There was a recent petition stating prison does not work. Under past Governments when many more criminals were imprisoned; crime rates plummeted and re-offending rates dropped significantly. So-called alternatives to prison like soft community orders don't work prison does. I feel re-offenders should be imprisoned without question. Rehab doesn't work, punishment does
